document_data.name: Nchaser's Fog Triath
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nchaser's fog triath''''', or '''''NFT''''', was a [[spell]], invented presumably by [[Nchaser]], that conjured the image of a lord or other leader (that is, a [https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/triath triath]). It was formed from fog but appeared quite solid. Moreover, it moved and signaled in time with the real triath, regardless of their separation, provided they remained on the same [[plane]]. The subject had to be a real leader who was familiar to the caster.{{Cite web/theedverse/2022-02-06 - blockchain}}
